forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 36F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 25C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 77F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 23C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 74F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 68F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 20C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 68F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 65F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 21C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 69F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
